alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:05AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Cattaraugus and southern Chautauqua Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 205 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Long Point State Park, or 12 miles west of Jamestown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Lakewood, Falconer, Mayville, Clymer, Long Point State Park, Jamestown West, Chautauqua Institution, Frewsburg, Chautauqua, Busti, New Albion, Gerry, Conewango, Ellington, Leon, Randolph and Napoli. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 6 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
